name: Don't miss the bus!
description:
Don't miss the bus! tiene como protagonista a un estudiante que vive en otra ciudad y debe llegar a tiempo a la estación de autobuses y volver a casa con su familia. Primer proyecto hecho en Bitsy.

-----

Don't miss the bus! has as its protagonist a student that lives in another city and must reach the bus station in time so he can go back home with his family. First project done using Bitsy.
